sentences.sContent: He seemed too ingenuous for a reporter.
sentences.sCn: 他好像太天真诚实，不适合做记者。

synos.tran: 天真的；坦白的；正直的；朴实的

words.tran: 天真无邪的少女；扮演天真姑娘的女演员

trans.tranCn: 天真的；坦白的；正直的；朴实的
trans.tranOther: an ingenuous person is simple, trusting, and honest, especially because they have not had much experience of life
